script.lang: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_on_off_budget AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, CASE WHEN acv.id IS NULL THEN 'Unallocated'::text ELSE acv.category_value::text END AS budget, acv.id as budget_id FROM amp_activities_categoryvalues aac JOIN amp_category_value acv ON aac.amp_categoryvalue_id = acv.id JOIN amp_category_class acc ON acc.id = acv.amp_category_class_id AND acc.keyname::text = 'activity_budget'::text RIGHT JOIN amp_activity a ON a.amp_activity_id = aac.amp_activity_id ORDER BY a.amp_activity_id;
